snippet: Workers from one company had shown up at a concrete plant in a northern county intending to take over a new development project, the news media said.
abstract: Dispute between two concrete plants in Xingtang County, China, erupts in turf battle that includes companies' front-end loaders as weapons; two employees are injured.
lead_paragraph: Workers from one company had shown up at a concrete plant in a northern county intending to take over a new development project, the news media said.

headline.print_headline: A Battle of Titans at a Construction Site
headline.main: Front-End Loaders in China Wage Heavy-Duty Combat Over Building Projects
